summary: Add a compact real-time calendar widget (date + time) with a stylish, minimalist design integrated near the app title/header.
architectural_notes: Calendar widget should be compact/minimalist and visually consistent with the app’s title/header styling (no layout disruption).

existing_features.title: Add a compact calendar widget that shows the current date and a live-updating current time (hours:minutes:seconds) using the user’s device local time, and update it automatically at least once per second while the widget is visible.

Place the calendar widget on the Dashboard page near the top (in the header area with the app title/streak) without disrupting existing layout, and style it to match the current dark neon theme (bg-card-dark, subtle border, neon accent for the current day).

Refine the existing LiveCalendarWidget to be noticeably more compact and minimalist while preserving the current functionality (local device date/time, live updates at least once per second, compact month grid, highlight current day).

Update the Dashboard header area (app title + streak + calendar area) to follow a consistent minimalist, stylish layout: tighter spacing, clearer hierarchy, and a cohesive typographic scale that matches the compact calendar.

Apply a minimalist styling pass across the app screens (Dashboard, Study, Gym, Nutrition, Goals, BottomNav) to make typography, spacing, borders, and card density feel consistent with the compact header/calendar, while keeping the existing dark/neon aesthetic.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a small in-app calendar widget showing real-time date and time (kept accurate)
Refine the calendar widget to be smaller/compact and styled in a minimalist, stylish way consistent with the app title/header area.
